long_description: Weighing in at a scant 485g, the NiteRider Pro 1200 Race Bike Light unleashes a 1,200-lumen beam to light the way while racing at night. Put it on your handlebars or helmet with the included mounts. Switch at top of the headlamp lets you quickly and easily change the amount of light output. 5 continuous light levels include high, medium, low, race and the battery-conserving "walk" mode; run times range from 1.75 hrs. on high to 7 hrs. on low to 24 hrs. on "walk". Light output for each level includes 1,200 lumens on high, 600 lumens on medium, 300 lumens on low, 180 lumens on race and 80 lumens on "walk". 8-step power gauge on top of the headlamp shows you the remaining battery life; charges in 6 hrs. Light can be mounted on handlebar (fits up to 31.8mm) or helmet (mount included); battery can be strapped to frame or stashed in a pack. The NiteRider Pro 1200 LED Race Bike Light includes headlamp, handlebar mount, helmet mount, lithium-ion battery with cord, and charger.
